title: Case Study Manifest
description: Ordered list of all case studies. This is the single authoritative index used by navigation, listing components, and the content verification script. Add one entry here when creating a new case study.

slug.description: URL slug matching the page filename and the individual JSON filename, e.g. "truist" for /truist and case-studies/truist.json.

title.description: Short display title used in navigation and listing contexts.

description.description: One-line summary shown in listing/navigation cards.

accent.description: Brand accent color. Must match the accent field in the individual study file.

ogImage.description: Optional thumbnail for listing cards. Mirrors the ogImage from the individual study file.
